Desc.entry: Godfrey Holmes' subjects are: Llandudno; Scarborough; Discovering Lost Churches and Chapels; The Urge to be a Collector; How to Survive a Runaway Juggernaut; Switzerland in the Summer; The Truant as Hero; Exploring the Alleyways of Derbyshire; Exploring Human Conversation. Fee charged, which is donated to charities Pathfinders (Chesterfield) or Ashgate Hospice.

Pubs.entry: Passage to Matlock; Passage to Wirksworth
